name: Unyielding Wing
description: Combat armor crafted with a foot-blade as its core. Powered by the user's mental energy, it is the result of cutting-edge science and technology from before the Cataclysm, and explodes with terrifying power when necessary.

weaponEffects.title: Frost Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

normals.name: Swan Arc
normals.description:
While on the ground, use Unyielding Wing to launch **5** consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **101.3%** of ATK plus **608** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **107.3%** of ATK plus **644** and knock the target back significantly.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **116.4%** of ATK plus **698** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **141.8%** of ATK plus **851** and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **241.5%** of ATK plus **1449** and launch the target.

normals.name: Sweeping Combo
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack **5** times in a row in mid-air and consume endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **72.1%** of ATK plus **433**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **65.6%** of ATK plus **394**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **115.8%** of ATK plus **695**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **131.1%** of ATK plus **787**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **343.9%** of ATK plus **2063** and deliver a **knockdown**.

normals.name: Dancing Flash
normals.description:
While using Swan Arc, tap and hold normal attack to pull the targets together and deal damage equal to **303.9%** of ATK plus **1823** to all targets within range. The last hit **strongly suspends** the target and deals damage equal to **95%** of ATK plus **570**.
**Passive**: After entering Latent State for **4** seconds or using any weapon skill, become immune to damage during the next Dancing Flash.

normals.name: Sweeping Dive
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Pummel.
While falling, deal damage equal to **95%** of ATK plus **570** each hit and continuously consume endurance.

normals.name: Waltz
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack to deal damage equal to **104.5%** of ATK plus **627** each time the target is hit. The last hit deals damage equal to **190%** of ATK plus **1140**. Gain **hyperbody** during this time and continuously consume endurance.

dodge.name: Dance Form
dodge.description: After dodging backward, tap normal attack **3** times consecutively to deal total damage equal to **572.8%** of ATK plus **3436** to the target, and **strongly suspend** the target with the first hit.

dodge.name: Latent State
dodge.description: Dodge before holding to enter Latent State, during which endurance is constantly consumed and speed is increased by **50%**. Increase speed by an additional **50%** in the Chilling Field. When exiting Latent State, deal damage equal to **305.1%** of ATK plus **1830** to all nearby targets and freeze them for **2** seconds.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

skill.name: Chilling Field
skill.description:
Pull nearby targets together, then deal damage equal to **857.7%** of ATK plus **5146** to them and **strongly suspend** them. The Wanderer enters the Chilling Field for **30** seconds. Cooldown: **25** seconds. Gain hyperbody when activating the skill.
**Passive**: When using any frost weapon discharge skill in the Chilling Field, deal Hoarfrost Damage equal to **125.8%** of ATK plus **755** **1** time and slow the target for **2** seconds (the slow effect is ineffective against bosses). While in the field, for every **12** times Unyielding Wing's hit effect is triggered, further triggers Spatial Slice, dealing damage equal to **165%** of ATK plus **990** **1** time to targets in the space every **2** seconds for **25** seconds (this also stops when the space disappears).

discharge.name: Starry Night
discharge.description: When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash a discharge skill, dealing damage equal to **553.2%** of ATK plus **3319** and **strongly launching** the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for **2.6** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.description: Receive Alyss's support when using any frost weapon skill in the Chilling Field, summoning Alyss to cast a discharge skill on the field, which is the equivalent of Wanderer casting a discharge skill. The skill that triggers the discharge skill will then be used again afterward. Alyss's supporting discharge skill and skill damage is equal to **70%** of her skill's original damage.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Receive Alyss's Support every time Starry Night is triggered and increase Starry Night and Hoarfrost Damage by **0%** for **1** seconds. Stack up to **3** times.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Increase the damage of Unyielding Wing's normal attack and Spatial Slice by **0%**. The Wanderer receives Alyss's Protection upon taking lethal damage, protecting the Wanderer from death **1** time and making the Wanderer immune to damage for a short time. Cooldown: **1** seconds.
Increase frost damage by **0%** when Alyss's Support reaches **3** stacks.
